mean_en: used to describe a relationship in which two people or groups agree to do something similar for each other, to allow each other to have the same rights, etc.
word_etyma: re 再、重复 + cip 拿，抓，握住 + roc + al  表示属于...的、具有...性质的、如...的 → a. 相互的,互惠的
sentence: We had a reciprocal relationship; I took care of him, and he took care of me.
sentence_trans: 我们有一种互惠互利的关系，我们相互照顾对方。
